title: Shady Mom-in-Law
overview: Jenny Han works as a fashion designer and she is successful at her job. She has a very close relationship with her mother, Wang Soo Jin. Her mother wants Jenny to marry Ahn Man Soo, but Jenny does not like Man Soo and ignores him. Jenny happens to meet Oh Eun Suk. They fall in love with each other at first sight. Eun Suk has a warm and quiet personality, but he believes in doing the right thing. He is from a wealthy family. They decide to get married, but Jenny's mother Soo Jin opposes their marriage.
